subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Diamondbacks took Barret Loux with the sixth pick in 2010, a spot ahead of Matt Harvey, but Arizona pulled its offer. He is now with an affiliate of the Cubs, his third organization.
snippet: The Diamondbacks took Barret Loux with the sixth pick in 2010, a spot ahead of Matt Harvey, but Arizona pulled its offer. He is now with an affiliate of the Cubs, his third organization.
